Module com.cyslide
Package com.cyslide.Model

Class Tile

java.lang.Object
com.cyslide.Model.Tile
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable
Direct Known Subclasses:
EmptyTile, IndestructibleTile, NumberTile
public abstract class Tile extends Object implements Cloneable
The abstract class representing a tile in the game.

    • mouvementAvailable

      public abstract boolean mouvementAvailable(int x, int y, String direction, RectangleWithLabel[][] table)
      Checks if the tile can be moved in the specified direction.
      Parameters:
      x - The x-coordinate of the tile.
      y - The y-coordinate of the tile.
      direction - The direction to check for movement.
      table - The game table containing the tiles.
      Returns:
      `true` if the movement is available, `false` otherwise.

      Swaps the positions of two tiles on the game table.

      j1 - The y-coordinate of the first tile.
      i2 - The x-coordinate of the second tile.
      j2 - The y-coordinate of the second tile.
      tab - The game table containing the tiles.
